TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed RuntimeHelpers/TryCode extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: Data to pass to the delegate.
Docs.summary: Represents a delegate to code that should be run in a try block..

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the RuntimeHelpers.TryCode delegate with the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ExecuteCodeWithGuaranteedCleanup%2A> method.
